name: Tooth Protection
detail: There are only 2 dental specialties that only focus on dental esthetics: Prosthodontics and Orthodontics

name: Dental Implants
detail: The implant fixture is first placed, so that it is likely to osseointegrate, then a dental prosthetic is added

name: Dental Care
detail: There are only 2 dental specialties that only focus on dental esthetics: Prosthodontics and Orthodontics

name: Teeth Whitening
detail: Bleaching methods use carbamide peroxide which reacts with water to form hydrogen peroxide loremis

name: Dental Calculus
detail: Types of bridges may vary, depending upon how they are fabricated and the way they anchor to the adjacent teeth

name: Prevention
detail: The most important part of preventive dentistry is to brush teeth with fluoride toothpaste approved by ADA
